languages.text: "Заводное сердце запретной святыни бьется не в ритм, скрежеща все больше с каждым ударом. Тот, кто начал твой путь вместе с вами, даст дорогу рассвету. В недрах плавилен скован разящий клинок, что в руке не удержишь. Обнажить его — навлечь рок и погибель".

traits.locale_text: "Заводное сердце запретной святыни бьется не в ритм, скрежеща все больше с каждым ударом. Тот, кто начал твой путь вместе с вами, даст дорогу рассвету. В недрах плавилен скован разящий клинок, что в руке не удержишь. Обнажить его — навлечь рок и погибель".

languages.text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."
languages.original_text: "Заводное сердце запретной святыни бьется не в ритм, скрежеща все больше с каждым ударом. Тот, кто начал твой путь вместе с вами, даст дорогу рассвету. В недрах плавилен скован разящий клинок, что в руке не удержишь. Обнажить его — навлечь рок и погибель".

traits.locale_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for the dawn. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

"The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for the dawn. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

"The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

languages.text: “某件禁忌的遗物，发条制成的核心毫无节律地跳动着，每次跳动都会变得更加刺耳。与你同行之人，会为黎明让出道路。在铸造厂深处，一把充满毁灭之力的刀被锻造出来。这把刀你无法握住，一旦将它拔出，便会招致劫难与毁灭。”
languages.original_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

traits.locale_text: “某件禁忌的遗物，发条制成的核心毫无节律地跳动着，每次跳动都会变得更加刺耳。与你同行之人，会为黎明让出道路。在铸造厂深处，一把充满毁灭之力的刀被锻造出来。这把刀你无法握住，一旦将它拔出，便会招致劫难与毁灭。”

languages.original_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

languages.text: «El corazón de relojería de una reliquia prohibida palpita arrítmico, chirriando más con cada latido. El que comenzó en su mismo camino abrirá paso al alba. En las profundidades de la fundición se forja una espada devastadora, una que no puede blandir. Desenvainarla es convocar la condenación y la destrucción».
languages.original_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

traits.locale_text: «El corazón de relojería de una reliquia prohibida palpita arrítmico, chirriando más con cada latido. El que comenzó en su mismo camino abrirá paso al alba. En las profundidades de la fundición se forja una espada devastadora, una que no puede blandir. Desenvainarla es convocar la condenación y la destrucción».

languages.text: 「禁断の遺物の時計仕掛けの心臓はリズムを狂わせ、鼓動するたびにさらに耳障りになっていく。あなたとともにあなたの道を歩み始めた者が、夜明けの道を切り開く。鍛冶場の奥深くで、破滅的な刃が鍛え上げられる。それを振り下ろすということは、破壊と破滅を呼び覚ますのだと同義なの」
languages.original_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

traits.locale_text: 「禁断の遺物の時計仕掛けの心臓はリズムを狂わせ、鼓動するたびにさらに耳障りになっていく。あなたとともにあなたの道を歩み始めた者が、夜明けの道を切り開く。鍛冶場の奥深くで、破滅的な刃が鍛え上げられる。それを振り下ろすということは、破壊と破滅を呼び覚ますのだと同義なの」

languages.text: "Das uhrwerkartige Herz eines verbotenen Relikts ist außer Takt geraten. Mit jedem Schlag zehrt der falsche Rhythmus stärker an den Nerven. Er, der Euren Weg mit Euch eingeschlagen hat, weicht dem Tagesanbruch. In den Tiefen der Gießerei wird eine verheerende Klinge geschmiedet, eine Klinge, die Ihr nicht halten könnt. Wird sie aus ihrer Scheide gezogen, so werden Untergang und Zerstörung herabgerufen."
languages.original_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

traits.locale_text: "Das uhrwerkartige Herz eines verbotenen Relikts ist außer Takt geraten. Mit jedem Schlag zehrt der falsche Rhythmus stärker an den Nerven. Er, der Euren Weg mit Euch eingeschlagen hat, weicht dem Tagesanbruch. In den Tiefen der Gießerei wird eine verheerende Klinge geschmiedet, eine Klinge, die Ihr nicht halten könnt. Wird sie aus ihrer Scheide gezogen, so werden Untergang und Zerstörung herabgerufen."

languages.text: « Le cœur mécanique d'une relique interdite ne bat plus en rythme et grince un peu plus à chaque instant. Celui qui a commencé à vos côtés sur le même chemin amènera l'aube. Dans les profondeurs de la fonderie est forgée une lame dévastatrice que vous ne pourrez pas manier. La dégainer apporterait la ruine et la destruction. »
languages.original_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."

traits.locale_text: « Le cœur mécanique d'une relique interdite ne bat plus en rythme et grince un peu plus à chaque instant. Celui qui a commencé à vos côtés sur le même chemin amènera l'aube. Dans les profondeurs de la fonderie est forgée une lame dévastatrice que vous ne pourrez pas manier. La dégainer apporterait la ruine et la destruction. »

languages.text: "Yasaklı bir yadigârın kurmalı kalbi ritmini kaybediyor. Her bir titreşimde daha da gıcırdıyor. Seninle birlikte bu yola adım atan, Tan'a yol açıyor. Dökümhanenin derinliklerinde harap edici bir kılıç dövülüyor. Öyle bir kılıç ki ellerinle kavuşamıyor. Onu kınından çıkarmak, felaket ve yıkımın habercisi."
languages.original_text: "The clockwork heart of a forbidden relic beats out of rhythm, grating more with every throb. He who started on your path with you will make way for daybreak. In the foundry depths, a devastating blade is forged, one that you cannot hold. To unsheathe it is to call down doom and destruction."
